channel.title: Secure-Lee
channel.description: Welcome to Secure-Lee.com, where I talk about items of security interest, as well as my fitness interests. Since that's pretty much all I do these days, I figured it was best to combine the two.

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Here I am, just getting started on yet another content system. This one seems like such a return to simplicity. No mysterious files to edit or user administration to fret about. I could get to like this. Just code and go, life is good.
